name: Johnny Fix
description:
This game is about mechanical transmission where you will be fixing mechanical gears and pieces to fix an item. The player must guess the right combination in order to fix the transmission. Hint: Observe carefully the rotation of the gear. 

Instruction
Solve the combination of the wheel gear before the time runs out.  

Hint: Wood To Gold & Look At the Rotation of the gears;
